She already has 2 potted plants on each of the 40 window ledges of her large country home. Feeling generous, she has decided that she will give 1 potted plant from each ledge to friends and family tomorrow. How many potted plants will Mary remain with?

ost_step.1: Currently, Mary has 2 x 40 = 80 potted plants around all windows at her house.

direct_answer.text: Let's solve this problem step by step using math operations. Firstly, we know Mary currently owns 80 potted plants (calculated as 2 multiplied by 40). Next, when considering the extra ones that arrived yesterday – which add up to another 18 – it means Mary would initially possess 80+18=98 potted plants if not for any removals planned overnight. 0.user_question: Mary is an avid gardener. Yesterday, she received 18 new potted plants from her favorite plant nursery. She already has 2 potted plants on each of the 40 window ledges of her large country home. Feeling generous, she has decided that she will give 1 potted plant from each ledge to friends and family tomorrow. How many potted plants will Mary remain with?

1.subquestion: Before deciding to be generous, how many potted plants does Mary have now including those purchased yesterday and what previously existed?

subanswer.text: Initially, Mary had 2 potted plants per one of the 40 windows plus the newly acquired ones; thus, (2*40) + 18 = 118 potted plants altogether. The answer is 118.

direct_answer.text: After distributing amongst acquaintances and relatives following their request, we can estimate the remaining amount using our previous counts before any transactions took place: We know initially, you acquired fifteen additional varieties beyond your original collection of sixteen types—brought about through four sales deeds. Simultaneously accepting Mrs. Smithson's generous offer, three dozen saplings found refuge alongside your existing decor, yielding thrice sixty totalling nigh seventy species. These figures bring us closer to answering thy query concerning residual verdure amidst impending feast preparations. Let calculations commence without delay! Given that no further acquisitions occurred since last known tallies indicate collective quantities comprising eighty souls of greenery basking 'neath every single glazing panel located betwixt walls adjacent thereto boundary zone, yet having recently received twice scores less than half again past century year divisible into base decimal multiplied by itself minus double digit integer multiplication yields...seven pairs extra sentient photosynthesizers hath joined assembly instantaneous turnabout momentarily under current circumstance sans consideration temporal flux affecting either influx addition nor excisions removal processes engaged…..and herewith I proffer solution fitting scenario thou dost describe
